remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67(v=vs.100))。For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請務必呼叫基底類別 方法，好讓註冊的委派可接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the base class method so that registered delegates receive the event.

The text description of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性為中繼屬性，表示它無法在執行階段變更。This property is a meta property, which means it cannot be changed at runtime. 中繼屬性在執行階段時建立屬性執行個體後不會變更，因此該屬性在設計階段時必須設定為常值。Meta properties do not change after a property instance is created at runtime, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否啟用這個執行個體進行執行和驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this instance is enabled for execution and validation.

value.span: 如果啟用以便執行和驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if enabled for execution and validation; otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果為 `false`，則會將所有子活動會視為它們的這個值也是 `false`。If `false`, all child activities are treated as if this value is `false` for them also. 這個屬性為中繼屬性，表示它無法在執行階段變更。This property is a meta property, which means it cannot be changed at runtime. 中繼屬性在執行階段時建立屬性執行個體後不會變更，因此該屬性在設計階段時必須設定為常值。Meta properties do not change after a property instance is created at runtime, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time.

summary.span: 由工作流程執行階段呼叫以執行活動。

span.span: Called by the workflow runtime to execute an activity.

returns.span: 執行工作的 ，可判斷活動停留在執行狀態，或轉換為已關閉狀態。

span.span: The of the run task, which determines whether the activity remains in the executing state, or transitions to the closed state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用於取得目前執行活動和工作階段的相關資訊，也用於從執行階段環境取得服務。The is used to get information about the currently running activity and workflow, and is also used to obtain services from the runtime environment. 執行會同步發生，當活動完成或達到中繼狀態時會將控制項傳回至呼叫者。The running occurs synchronously, returning control to the caller when the activity is completed or reaches an intermediate state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範 `Execute` 方法的實作。The following code example shows an implementation of the `Execute` method. 在此範例中，會建構 Outlook 電子郵件訊息，並將其傳送中。In this example, an Outlook email message is constructed and sent. 這個範例來自 Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK 範例。This example is from the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Outlook Workflow Wizard 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408)。For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408). The name of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個的預設值為空白字串。Default value for this is the empty string. 這個屬性為中繼屬性，表示它無法在執行階段變更。This property is a meta property, which means it cannot be changed at runtime. 中繼屬性在執行階段時建立屬性執行個體後不會變更，因此該屬性在設計階段時必須設定為常值。Meta properties do not change after a property instance is created at runtime, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何建立活動，並將活動當做子系加入至複合活動，並設定 的值。The following code shows how to create activities and add them as children to a composite activity and set the value for . 這個程式碼範例是 ThrowWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜擲回 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkFlow.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[擲回範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc)。For more information, see [Throw Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc). MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event StatusChanged As EventHandler(Of ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於正在執行之 的 變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the of a running changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 當活動 (活動 A) 訂閱不同活動 (活動 B) 的 `StatusChanged` 事件時，相關聯 `Activity` 的 屬性會參考所訂閱的活動 (活動 B)，而相關聯的 `Sender` 物件會參考訂閱者活動 (活動 A) 的執行內容。When an activity (Activity A) subscribes to a different activity's (Activity B) `StatusChanged` event, the `Activity` property of the associated refers to the activity subscribed to (Activity B), and the associated `Sender` object refers to the execution context of the subscribing activity (Activity A).

para.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請務必呼叫基底類別 方法，好讓註冊的委派可接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the base class method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly StatusChangedEvent As DependencyProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可藉由剖析對應的相依性屬性來間接存取每一個公用屬性及這個型別的事件。You indirectly access each public property and event of this type by the resolution of a corresponding dependency property. 這個相依性屬性是名為 `XProperty` 或 `XEvent` 的公用靜態欄位，其中 X 是對應的屬性。This dependency property is the public static field named `XProperty` or `XEvent`, where X is the corresponding property. [!INCLUDE[DependencyPropertyRemark](~/includes/dependencypropertyremark-md.md)]

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, provides un-initialization by a service provider for the activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法提供一項活動，可以清除初始化期間配置的資源。This method provides the activity with an opportunity to clean up resources allocated during initialization. 當保證活動不再執行任何執行作業時，呼叫 。 is called when an activity instance is guaranteed not to perform any more execution. 對於不實作 的活動，這會在活動關閉後立即發生，或是若活動從未執行時，在工作流程完成時發生。For activities that do not implement , this occurs immediately after the activity closes, or, if the activity never executed, at workflow completion. 對於 活動，這會在補償或工作流程完成時發生。For activities, this occurs either after compensation or at workflow completion.
